name: Running Crazy
description:
I have been waiting for you for a long time. The beauties are waiting for you at the finish line. Run!

Welcome to Cat Dash! This is a simple yet addictive game that challenges your reaction speed and skills. In the game, an adorable little cat is sprinting at lightning speed, and you need to use your mouse-clicking skills to guide it past all obstacles and ensure it stays on the track. As you progress, the level difficulty will steadily increase, and the cat's speed will become increasingly astonishing. There are a total of 100 levels waiting for you to conquer!

But that's not all! In the game, you can also collect coins and use them to unlock exquisite CG gallery images, allowing you to fully appreciate each finely crafted masterpiece. This game not only tests your skills but also provides you with a visual feast. Come join our dash frenzy and enjoy the ride!
